website_summaries.verdict: The Zvox Z-Base 555 has a nearly perfect sound-bar design and a solid feature set, but it won't please critical listeners.
pros: The Zvox Z-Base 555's pedestal design is our favorite for a sound bar, looking more like furniture than home audio equipment
Zvox has also added several oft-requested features, including a front-panel display, digital audio inputs, and true input switching
The Z-Base 555 also excels at dialogue clarity, with several adjustment options to dial in the sound to your liking
cons: The Z-Base 555's overall sound quality won't impress audiophiles, especially on music and dynamic action movies
And at $400, you're paying a premium over other budget sound bars, although their design isn't nearly as nice

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds but NOT reliable
customer_reviews.text: Stay away. I'm only posting this review to convey my complete disappointment with this product. I read the reviews and proceeded with confidence. My first one was a refurbished unit that ended up with a blown speaker within 90 days. Amazon was great about taking it back for a refund. My second now doesn't work due on the optical digital input which basically is the only input from my TV. So other than rare situational BlueRay's in my bedroom TV I'll never use it. I have a home theater in my livingroom so this was supposed to support regular TV watching when we didn't want to blow the roof off the house. When it worked the sound quality was great.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron LaBeau

customer_reviews.title: Definite improvement in sound quality from our flat screen TV
customer_reviews.text: This unit is easy to install and produces a full, rich sound. Lots of adjust-ability with 3 pre-set modes, bass and treble adjustment, a dialogue enhancement feature and volume leveling. We purchased the unit because of less than desired sound quality, especially for dialogue, from our flat screen TV, which is not wall mounted. This unit is definitely an improvement, although we still miss some dialogue in situations where there is a lot of background music. The first unit that was shipped had a problem of turning off after about an hour, but Amazon was great about handling a replacement, which is functioning just fine.
customer_reviews.author: cincipapa24

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Delivered with a blown subwoofer speaker. Returned it. That's one strike. My parents purchased a ZVOX for their home and a year later it died (conveniently right after the warranty expired). Strike two. Called ZVOX and they said that they don't repair their equipment at all, and don't have any authorized local places to send it either. Strike three, I'm out. Giving them 2 stars because when my parents' one worked, it sounded great. But there are plenty of better options out there, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing sound bar
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing sound bar. I had considered purchasing a Bose and decided to research before I did. It was around $300. But reading the reviews there I learned a lot about Zvox and how people were not satisfied with Bose. Reviews were excellent about a Zvox. Powerful, great bass, treble all adjustable and super installation. No need to disconnect any hook ups on your T.V. We love it in our house, never regretted buying it from the moment we turned it on. Found it online for $149.00 and the best it is made in the good ole USA!!!!!!!!!! Better get one if you're considering a purchase..
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: What a speaker system!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a speaker system you can believe in! This system sounds great or should I say fantastic to me! It is so simple to set up (one optical toslink cable)and has super sound. Now I can understand the dialogue without giving up the sound effects. The base rocks but doesn't overshadow all the higher sound details or the dialogue. It does everything the manufacture says that it does... How refreshing! I bought one for a 55" LG TV in the game room and couldn't be more pleased. Now I am going to buy one for the TV in the den. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants great sound to go with their TV.
customer_reviews.author: Rimfire Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: Home theater surround bar
customer_reviews.text: Great home theater solution for small to medium sized rooms. This is a nifty gadget, I consider it is totally underrated. This solution puts out a decent volume level, minimal to no distortion when turning up, keeps wires to a minimum, voice clarity is probably in the top tier within the sound bar segment. Has several great features such as output leveling and voice enhancement as well as a disappearing display which not even bose or klipsh have in the top of the line and more expensive products. Give it a try, this product surprises with its performance and features.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo F. Arbelaez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastical
customer_reviews.text: Bought and set up at my Dad's . He is old and deaf , but didnt want "One of them stupid looking boxes with wires on side of my TV(sub)"SO I set this up with ease, The dialog enhancer is very nice and music sounded good. Movies even got a bit of a rumble out of this. My dads favorite part is the LED volume numbers going off after adjustment so its a clean non distracting line under the TV . No bluetooth but I had to draw a diagram of his remoteto show him the buttons to push , so bluetooth is no big loss for us . I would buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Major Miner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Zvox 555 from HIDIF Lifestyle through Amazon.com. it was not in stock at Amazon. After researching moderately priced soundbars ( $250-$500) and listening to them at local electronic stores I felt the Zvox 555 was the best of the lot! It allows you to control, base, treble , play different surround modes, and emphasize voice quality when dialog is difficult to understand. Music sounds really very good when played thtough the Zvox 555. Having mutiple inputs add to the versatility of how you can use it. Finally the size of the unit makes it very easy to locate and set up. It doesn't take up much space and is very easy to set up! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: John L. Tentromono

customer_reviews.title: Great Soundbar!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded our electronics for home entertainment and bought this sound bar due to reviews that discussed ability to adjust to hear voices over background music . . . and it functions very well. It also was easy to link with my satellite remote . . . to automatically turn-on when the TV / Receiver is turned-on, change volume, and adjust settings (yep, just one remote for TV and sound despite two separate devices). Also like that the illuminated indicator turns itself off after a few seconds when adjusting sound.
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound quality and projection
customer_reviews.text: Great remote control, sound quality. Not too many different controls. All the inputs you need. There is one issue, that it needs to be turned on with the power button (or remote) if it is not playing for a while. Maybe this is a feature for saving energy but I don't like this feature or think it will save a significant amount of energy. Sound quality is good. (note: this is not the bluetooth model, get a different model if you want bluetooth)
customer_reviews.author: slartibartfast

customer_reviews.title: Improved TV Sound.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all reviews we purchased this unit for our 42" Toshiba in our living room. It sets below on a stand. Set up was fast. Have not set volume up with our Dish receiver as yet. Over all this is a very good unit and sound has improved. Christmas music is great. However best improvement is in the voice sound quality. We can understand the dialog much better. Find a good price on this unit and go with it. We found an open box direct from the company and feel this was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tate

customer_reviews.title: My brother said: you need a ZVOX
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble hearing dialogue on my Visio tv. I kept increasing the volume, but I still could not understand what anyone was saying most of the time. Then my brother said you need a ZVOX. I said what the heck is that. The rest is history. I will never watch tv in my home again without the ZVOX. I hear and understand all of the dialogue.
customer_reviews.author: Orazzan

customer_reviews.title: Good sytem easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. I had considered returning it because of some damage that was sustained during shipping. I purchased it during Black Friday weekend sale. I didn't return it because when I priced it for replacement it was several hundred dollars more. So I kept it plugged it in. Wife came home and from the Kitchen she noticed the difference in sound quality. Good sound. Much better than the TV had. Voices are much clearer and I actually notice the background music now. Good system. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the ZVOX
customer_reviews.text: I've had this now for about a year and I still love the thing. Great construction, really good sound, and you can't beat the price for the performance. Best Buy used to carry this thing but stopped selling it because they couldn't move higher priced sound bases and bars that gave them more margin. I can't say why but the sound is just better coming out of a system with a wooden framework (though you couldn't tell it's wood inside).
customer_reviews.author: Biff

customer_reviews.title: Love it! The built-in speakers on my Samsung 46" ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The built-in speakers on my Samsung 46" LCD required me to keep increasing the volume to watch any program. I used to be able to hear with volume set to 12, now need to increase to 18+. My living room is small so I wanted something compact and with good sound. The Zvox 555 meets both requirements. Set-up is as easy as Zvox claims, no more than 10 minutes required. My shipment came with a digital audio cable included (not listed on package details) so you don't need to purchase one separately.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Provides the sound we have been missing
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Zvox 555 to replace the sound from our 42" Sony Bravia. We had a very hard time understanding dialog on shows, especially those with load background music/sounds. By using the Dialog emphasis mode, we can now understand all dialog, even on BBC shows! I know this does not replace true surround sound systems but it is a marked improvement over the speakers in the TV set. We choose the Zvox over the Bose Solo on specs alone as we have no store nearby to compare the two but the Zvox will support TVs larger than 42" and that is an important consideration for us.
customer_reviews.author: D. White

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want a big surround system with multiple speakers & cables, so I decided to give this a try. Very easy to set up and the sound is wonderful. Instructions for syncing it to satellite/cable remote were included, but not for our specific remote. I used the ZVOX "Learning" feature and it worked like a charm. The difference in sound from our LG tv to the sound using the ZVOX is amazing. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: xragman

customer_reviews.title: Great unit but remote is buggy
customer_reviews.text: A great unit and is still going strong but the remote quit working which is a downside
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miller

customer_reviews.title: Performs exactly as stated
customer_reviews.text: After some research and comparisons selected the Zvox 555 to improve and control the audio quality of our new Samsung TV, The purchase through Amazon arrived in a few days. The Zvox was very easy to install and performs exactly as described. We have definitely improved the audio quality, especially the speech component which comes in great for British mysteries and shows with a lot of background "noise". Since the TV sits on top of the Zvox it does not take up additional space as a sound bar would and it actually raised the TV to a better eye level. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R.Zeee

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound from a small footprint
customer_reviews.text: The 10 minute setup may be true for the generation that prizes a large amount of Boom. I listen to "older" music, and do not like the boom, so it took me about 30 minutes to set up a mode for Classics, and a mode for Big Band Era music, then another 10 minutes or so to make dialog clear, In the end, it works well, not a replacement for studio monitors, but very good for our bedroom TV. This is a very good solution if you have the cabinet to set it on. excellent price to performance ratio.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Crumm

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: My 55" Sony TV fits right on top of this sound bar. It has three surround sound settings, ability to adjust the base and treble, can mute the sound when needed, ability to level the sound so you don't get louder sound when commercials play, can make the speaking voices louder/clearer without raising the volume, and great volume changing. All of these show up on the sound bar as you change or set them. Makes your TV sound 100% better than the TV speakers. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: gkirn

customer_reviews.title: I can hear the dialogue!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this sound system rocks!!! I had taken to bringing up closed captioning on almost all shows because I was unable to hear dialogue buried in background music/sounds. The ZVOX brought the voices forward. Now I can generally hear everything. This has enhanced my television experience tremendously. If you're having a problem hearing dialogue, this is the system for you!
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: ZVOX 555 Great for Hearing Impaired
customer_reviews.text: As you age your ability to understand voices on TV diminishes and is very frustrating. The ZVOX 555 solved that problem for me. Now I understand the dialogue and could not be more pleased with this speaker. In order to understand dialogue, I thought I would have to suffer with reduced sound quality.....not so. The quality of the sound has drastically improved and resembles that of a "theater" setting. This is one great speaker....a definite buy.
customer_reviews.author: Scottkb2000

customer_reviews.title: Certainly helps with hearing what is being said
customer_reviews.text: We have always had trouble hearing what is being said on our large screen TV...which is no where as large as many of our friends have. The only choice was to turn up the sound, which of course just amplified the other sound effects and didn't make hearing the words any better. This helps. There is a DE setting with brings the voices to the forefront. Overall the sound is better and crisper. The box does just blend in, you don't even notice it under the TV. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hardin

customer_reviews.title: I Can Hear Dialogue Again!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased an LG 47" television from Amazon. The sound was adequate but not great and, having a hearing problem to start with, I found myself saying, "what did they say?" quite a bit during a movie. With this unit and its dialogue enhancement feature that problem has, for the most part, gone away and I'm very happy with it. Setup was a snap. Somehow I managed to luck out and nabbed this earlier this month when Amazon reduced the price to $359 for two days.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Q.

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound, no mess of wires, and delivers surprising range. A very good, simple, solution for a smaller space. I'd give the sound five stars (for what it is) but I took a star off the overall rating for value as it seems like you're paying a sizable premium for digital inputs. Overall I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: akalavelle

customer_reviews.title: ZVOX555 soundbase system review
customer_reviews.text: The ZVOX 555 soundbase was delivered on time and packaged well. It was easy to install. We can hear dialogue more clearly using the sound options. A lot depends on the source of the program we are viewing as to the quality of sound. Personally, I, a senior, prefer the sound system in our small, older t.v. with built in speakers. Due to the thin t.v.s made now, the quality built in sound systems are poor. So we will make due with the ZVOX 555 soundbase at this time. I would recommend this product. Lulu
customer_reviews.author: Carol Paolucci

customer_reviews.title: Like my Zvox 555
customer_reviews.text: I'm 84 years old and my hearing is not great. That said, it has the best sound of anything I've owneed previously with some costing more. I have fiber optic TV with settop box. I connected the settop box to the sound bar with an optical cable. Voice sounds are very good with plenty of output. Music from the music chanels are outstanding to my ears. I never listened much before, but now I really enjoy it. Instruments often sound like they are being played in the room. Visitors have commented on the good sound. For me its a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Linwood

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it five stars but the output leveling feature seems like it could be improved. Sometimes the commercials come out sounding low (I like this) and music channels the commercials are a little high on Direct TV. It is not a big annoyance though. The surround sound has limits but is ok to me. Overall I am pleased because I am amazed at how good it sounds. The base is really good too. It looks so good my wife even likes the way our TV sits on top.
customer_reviews.author: AGM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, affordable compact TV sound system
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a compact speaker system for the medium sized (32") HDTV in my home office. This unit fits right under the TV and is easy to set up. It came with clear instructions on how to connect it and how to configure it so that it responds to the TV remote's control signals for audio and for power. The sound quality is very good and the sound can be turned up quite a bit without introducing audible distortion.
customer_reviews.author: D. Steinborn

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected, more cracking than rice krispies
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews i bit the bullet, this was a mistake.. Not happy at all. Not sure if the unit itself is defective but it cant go past volume level of 13-15 before the bass speaker starts popping and cracking.. Certainly not what i expected. I the highs and mids are some of the clearest i have heard but this is not something i can live with and will be asking amazon for a return/refund.
customer_reviews.author: bpblaze

customer_reviews.title: I recall when an actor was required to deliver a ...
customer_reviews.text: I recall when an actor was required to deliver a line with an understandable voice. Now, it seems, the hoarseness of the voice or the whispering of lines without regard to clarity is the norm. With more and more television dramas "enhancing" the sound with fake ambients, thus disguising the voices, this unit can be set to concentrate on delivering the script.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Great for small rooms with Plasma TV
customer_reviews.text: We have a great room that contains our living room, kitchen and dining room. So our actual living room area is not large. We didn't want a bunch of speakers all over the place for 3D sound. This ZVox 555 was perfect for our room and works well with our Panasonic ST30 Plasma TV. Great sound in one nifty box - keeps everything neat and tidy. Set up for the ZVox was incredibly simple. We love the dialog enhancement feature. Thanks ZVox!
customer_reviews.author: SnowMane

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement over built in TV speakers
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good and the volume available is excellent. I compared this to the Bose system (I have several Bose products) and found that I like the size better so that my TV base wasn’t hanging off the edge and I also felt that the Bose was way too pricey for what I was looking to do. Several friends have heard the system and they also made a purchase for their home. Is it perfect no, but is it a great value? Yes!
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but a little fluky
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get working with a universal controller. Twice sound went out for about 10-20 seconds, then came back on. Used to have volume set about 11, but for some reason now I have to keep it at 18. But it does sound great with good bass. Our situation needs to have the TV on top of the box, so our options were limited. This fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. I never got it to work
customer_reviews.text: I hooked it up, turned it on and never got to hear it work. There was no remote, so it was basically useless. The remote is out of stock. Amazon was great about returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Brumbaugh

customer_reviews.title: A great enhancement for your sound
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The dialog enhancement works wonderful and the no blaring at commercials is a welcome relief. This is in a large room so I have added a sub to give some real punch... Overall better natural sound than bose and other systems
customer_reviews.author: jjf

customer_reviews.title: Love the set
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a 65" Sharp Aquos. Love the set, but the sound is terrible. Lots of volume, but the dialogue was near impossible to understand. I first bought a Vizio S3820W, but it was no help. All it did was make the garble louder. Sent it back and purchased the ZVOX 555. What a difference! Voices are clear, volume is more than I'll ever need, and it looks much better than the Vizio soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: received with packaging concerns
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly. concerned with excessive taping of box gave impression that had been opened and repackaged. Included 4 cords, 2 o which were tied with twist binders, 2 of which were not tied but the binders were loose in the box, again giving impression of repackaging. After set up and use, will revise posting.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Very good price and fast delivery. I had to replace my existing sound bar and opted for the zvox 555. It is les cumbersone than my present set up and sounds just as good or better. OIt was super easy to connect only one cable. I'm very pleased with this purchase and would revommend it to anyone looking for an upgrade to their HDTV sound system.
customer_reviews.author: MPL023

customer_reviews.title: Satified customer
customer_reviews.text: I'm no audiophile and I put up with the built in speakers of my Sony Bravia for 2 years, but after having to turn on the subtitles on a movie with very low and unclear dialogue I started looking for a solution. This device works well for me. The sound is much better than before, it fits into the space I had, and it works without having to think about it. I'm hoping it will fit my needs for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Clanon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this system. It has excellent sound and good customer service. I had a question about it use and they responded quickly and with detailed instruction. It is big and my 46 inch LED TV sits on top of it. Before you purchase it, make sure it has the connections you need, I replaced a Vizio soundbar with this unit and this is far superior. The price is more, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Best system for the money and I have tried most ...
customer_reviews.text: Best system for the money and I have tried most of them. Clear dialogue, and decent bass for a unit with no separate woofer. Connects with one cord if you have a digital audio input and fits nicely under the TV. Better than any soundbar I have heard. No, this does not sound like a 7.1 surround system with 5 or 6 speakers, but for under 200 bucks, it's much better than I would have guessed.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Really a great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really a great deal for the price. I have a hearing problem and it has a setting to enhanced spoken words they certainly helps. It is not a good as having a multi-speaker system scattered around the room, but compared to other sound bars it is superior.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Great sound improvement
customer_reviews.text: We almost bought a Bose system, but after reading a lot of reviews on Bose we saw numerous people saying great things about this ZVOX 555 We we bought this instead.. It was an easy set up and we love the sound Loud, oh you can make it as loud as you like.. Its awesome watching a football game now, the speaker really improves the overall experience of watching the game
customer_reviews.author: Spiderman

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this- it is a vast improvement in audio quality over the little built-in Samsung speakers on or flat-screen TV. 4 stars instead of 5 mostly because we don't hear a lot of real stereo separation or Surround-sound; but overall we love the improvement in sound quality, and the various options that are offered.
customer_reviews.author: Lavrans

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was considering the Bose TV speaker system, but I am glad I chose the ZVOX. This system works with my cable remote and was easy to program. There are controls on the front, but I usually use the remote.The product is very sturdy with good sound quality. The audio cables that came with the speakers did not work on my TV ( Samsung ) but a quick trip to Radio Shack (and an extra $20) was all it took.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W. Weik

customer_reviews.title: Best sound system I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Best sound system I have ever purchased. I wasn't sure at first and now I will never use a flat screen for audio ever again. Bose may be good but this is the s*** when it comes to price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O'Loughlin

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a year and half. I love it . Read reviews and determined that this was the best. Haven't had any problems whatsoever. I did buy protection plan due to the amount I spent. Beats multi surround speakers because I tried them and took them back.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Russell

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, I am not much of a reviewer, but I can say that for the price, this soundbar was a steal. i live in a fairly small apartment, so I believe that this was made for smaller enclosures. If you have a large place, don't expect it to perform, but you should have enough money for something bigger anyway. Multiple ways to adjust sound leveling and dialog emphasis works great. Not too much bass, but it does have a subwoofer out if you want to connect a powered subwoofer to it. I've done that, and the bass response is perfect. All in all a great product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn & Astrid

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I used to have to keep cranking the volume to hear the words in the movies but this surround sound system has settings so you can hear the words. This is one of the easiest setups I've ever done. I would recommend this product to anyone that is looking for a surround sound system that works. And commercials do not blair anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Krieger

customer_reviews.title: very good speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it levels the audio so the commercials don't suddenly start blasting and because it can sit below the TV instead of sticking out like the bar type speakers do. I like the sound better than the two bar type speakers I listened to. More expensive than a cheap bar speaker but in my opinion worth it. Shipping from the company was fast and well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford D. Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Way better than Bose
customer_reviews.text: After destroying two Bose solo units we tried this instead. Way bigger than the Bose solo, but not so big as to be unmanageable, super easy to set up, and fabulous surround sound! So far we are loving this! Although after the Bose incident (see my review of the Bose solo), I did buy the extended warranty... Just to be safe ;)
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Huge upgrade over tv speakers. Best part is that your cable remote can control the on/off and volume so you still only have to deal with one remote. I listened to live band on tv and was amazed how loud it could go without any distortion. The sound was actually better louder that softer. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Doug N

customer_reviews.title: Voice enhanced sound.
customer_reviews.text: Speech on old and new movies now becomes clear. Controls provide a needed means of setting sound to your preference. Do not expect audio equal to a up scale sound system but it is great for TV and satellite music. Speech seems to be clarified by reducing background sound while enhancing dialog when actors speak. This feature can be turned off or on as one wishes. I would recommend to anyone wishing to improve their TV sound and definitely to anyone needing help understanding dialog.
customer_reviews.author: Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Bose Solo.
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is considering a Bose Solo for their TV, I suggest this unit. Even though I haven't had this ZVOX 555 long, the Bose Solo lasted only about 1 1/2 years, and it only had a 6 month warranty.
customer_reviews.author: randstuff4u

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a few weeks. The sound is good and has3 surround settings to choice from. The only problem is after it's been on awhile, I start hearing this buzzing noise in the background that is very annoying. The company website blames it on certain cable companies' signals, but I don't have this issue with my TV speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Renzi

customer_reviews.title: Zvox 555 review.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Had the system for about 2 months now. Especially like the enhanced dialog mode. Bought it for that reason and has come through. Haven't tried the "surround sound" too much, but seems to work satisfactorily. Does provide a much richer sound than TV speakers even at lower levels. Although the speakers are supposedly able to run up to level 30, we normally only have to set at level 10-12 for very satisfactory sound. Installation was very quick and "learning" by existing TV remote went very smoothly. Optical cable connection working very well and the size of the cabinet fit perfectly in our existing built in TV cabinet enclosure.
customer_reviews.author: J Lopez

customer_reviews.title: ZVOX 555
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. Took me about 10 minutes to unpack and set it up. Made the adjustments that I wanted and everything is A-OK. I wear hearing aids and the sound is flawless. I can now hear the dialog above the background music/noise etc. Would definitely would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Esposito

customer_reviews.title: A great buy !!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of trouble following dialog on one of my tv's. I decided to try this after reading the reviews and love it. It definitely makes the dialog clear and is much less expensive than a full room sound system.
customer_reviews.author: trainer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Speaker - Outstanding Company
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good sounding unit from a company that REALLY supports its products. I had an IR receiver go out on ours three years after I bought it and the company replaced it for free.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Willis

customer_reviews.title: What an upgrade for these flatscreen TV's now!
customer_reviews.text: Fltscreen TV's have a great picture now but their sound is absolutly horrible, this box is easy to set up and to control and the sound is tops in my mind. I have a love for sound systems and this unit is a must for those who just want something easy to use, sound top notch and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: 80omni

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This system is just awesome. Hearing problem solved. Now I can clearly hear the dialog which means I can actually enjoy TV movies and programming again. I do not have to blast the volume to uncomfortable levels. Compact, easy to install, this is a must for anyone who is hearing impaired.
customer_reviews.author: Endura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price at 199
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price at 199. I upgraded from the Zvox mini which cost the same price 6 years ago. Fuller sound, deeper base, and the perfect piece for the tv to sit. The DE setting is great to use when vocals are low but I turn it off when listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: I must have read 20 reviews before buying this unit. I would have to say that it was stupid proof for hooking up. That easy. As far as the performance goes it works very nicely in our bedroom for being 4 feet from the end of our bed. I haven't hooked it up in the living room to hear how it would perform in a much lager room as I am considering buying one for that TV as well. When I hear how that sounds I will update comments.
customer_reviews.author: N. Boatright

customer_reviews.title: Single cabinet sound system
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied. Good clear sound. Met all of my expectations. I did not want to pay full price for a new unit, so i settled for a like new for half the price. I will recommend it to any that I meet, looking for a like product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: James R.. Conran

customer_reviews.title: great unit
customer_reviews.text: I really like this unit. Prior to buying, we never could hear the dialogue in movies and had to always use the closed captions (and we're 30). With this, that has never been a problem and the overall quality is much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great sound great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the depth of sound and the ability to set for different types of settings. After a technical assistance call, got everything set up in about a half an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Paluso4art

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound
customer_reviews.text: I was interested in the Bose unitl, but after reading a few of the reviews I decided the features of this unit were more in line of what I wanted (adjustable bass and treble, volume display). The sound is incredible! Also, the ability to use the cable box remote was a double bonus. I use this sound system with a 32 inch LG HDTV in my living room with a blue ray player and I could not be happier. Great product and I am very happy with my purchase and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: RabTab

customer_reviews.title: A quality sound system
customer_reviews.text: I just love the sound quality of this system. It provided what the newer TV's just don't give us anymore. Quality rich sound!
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound System
customer_reviews.text: I bought a reconditioned ZVOX 555, and it looked brand new. The case had no scratches or any appearance of damage. This unit has performed flawlessly and we truly love it. We have had it 4 or 5 months now and no problems have surfaced.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Very good. I wish my hearing aids were anyway close ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I wish my hearing aids were anyway close to this quality. Basically junk and they cost $6000.00 . I believe ZVOX could use it's capabilities and make hearing enhancement units in the $500 range and capture A market that is huge, in the millions. I have been wearing various models for over 20 years and I am still looking. ZVOX could be the Apple hearing enhancements (you can't say hearing aids. The industry pretends they are doctors! Dscheff@aol. com
customer_reviews.author: Dean F. Scheff

customer_reviews.title: An excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works like none other I have tried in the last couple of years. I only wish I had known about it sooner. The ability to control the base and treble levels as well as the dialogue enhancement feature are terrific. I have had some hearing loss in reent years and this unit makes up for it plain and simple. I also chose it over another four letter name brand because this unit hooks up easily, has a more substantial cabinet, and is easily adjustable with the remote.
customer_reviews.author: G. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I would lose my own hearing
customer_reviews.text: I purchasd two of these for (of course) different locations. They have made my life so much quieter. Even when a bit loud, the sound is not deafening ! Prior to this purchase, I have tried many things and still, in order for my husband to understand what was said, I felt like I would lose my own hearing. I am very pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Gilder

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar.
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome sound bar. Easy to connect, and very nifty audio enhancement option. Works well with my 60" old Samsung TV
customer_reviews.author: koop

customer_reviews.title: need a better remote
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit. I have placed it under my Sony 40" HDTV. I especially like the dialog enhance. It clears up and makes more understandable movie dialog. The only thing that is less than satisfactory is the remote. It does not operate the unless it is within 20% of right in front of the unit. Every other remote I have ever used will operate the equipment from across the room.
customer_reviews.author: wright bonte

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the positive reviews....
customer_reviews.text: just purchased this and so far so good. SUPER EZ set up! Remote control set up a breeze. Absolutely no problems. Very please with the refurbished product/price. Go ZVOX!!! and THANK YOU Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Zvox 555 vs. 550: What a difference one number makes!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a ZVOX 550 and just replaced it with a 555. What a difference; well worth the extra $100!! My primary problem with the 550 was that there was no display so you never knew what your settings were. Also, the remote was very finicky. The 555 solves those problems. Voice clarity, my primary issue with my TV (Samsung HD UN46B8500) is great and the design of the ZVOX to serve as a TV base is practical and is easy to set up. I'm sure there are better speaker systems out there but for $400, you can't beat this product. Nice job ZVOX!
customer_reviews.author: MikeSz

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected sound
customer_reviews.text: I brought the 555 a few weeks ago and I have to say its great addition for my tv. Sounds great with movies and didn't expect it to sound as good as it did, very happy with my purchase. Like some of the comments doesn't have deep bass but it does a descent job for the type of system it is. Great sound quality and I recommend it for anyone that just wants to hear a movie with a much better sound without it rumbling the room.
customer_reviews.author: bradley cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Did not Deliver for Me
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning this. First issue it was really a heck of a lot bigger then I expected. And, I am not convinced that it significantly improved my audio, and my ability to understand dialog.
customer_reviews.author: S. B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good room-filling sound; Better than TV speakers but not true stereo
customer_reviews.text: Good room-filling sound and much better than TV speakers; easy to connect to TV.Just wish it was true stereo rather than simulated stereo.
customer_reviews.author: JMark

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic option rather than a sound bar or many other ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic option rather than a sound bar or many other high priced units. I have 2 of these and use hearing aids. The voice clarity and leveling of commercials are great features.
customer_reviews.author: Roy U.

customer_reviews.title: Zvox
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very good. Fits under my TV real nice. Didnt notice it didnt have bluetooth, i would have gotten the next one up. Otherwise it met my expectations
customer_reviews.author: R. beltran

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it !
customer_reviews.text: The ZVOX 555 is exactly what I was looking for. I wish I had gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: D Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I can actually hear the dialog on tv shows now and it gives you 3 levels of adjustment. Super easy to set up and some great sound.
customer_reviews.author: thehdman

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are True!
customer_reviews.text: I love it and I still don't have my TV yet! I'm using this with the Belkin Song Stream Bluetooth Music Receiver and the sound is awesome! I can't wait to get my new TV!!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Sound..This unit is way better than those other sound bars and has a deep bass. Tried the Vizio and the Samsung and this unit was the only one that I kept.
customer_reviews.author: Gus L

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Very solid speaker system, with decent bass despite the small (relatively) size. Fits well under my tv and is plenty of sound for my small apartment living room. It doesn't equal a real multi speaker system, but is reasonably priced, easy to use, and very space efficient. I've had it about a year, and have had no issues with durability/reliability at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesnwine

customer_reviews.title: fantastic sound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound from a signal cabinet box. Great base with no subwoofer required. I was originally going to buy the 420 but opted for the 555 because of the higher wattage and additional sound features. Great value for the price and more econimical than competition pricing. I didn't realize it until I setup the unit,but there is even and additional output to connect a subwoofer if desired. Works with my cable box remote. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: Great sound easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Great sound easy to setup. I advise buying a better optical cable if you plan on using the optical connection. I bought the "Mediabridge Toslink Cable (3 Feet)" it works great. it was also very easy to program to use my existing remote. It took about 30 sec. You can program volume, mute, and power.
customer_reviews.author: K. Urlaub

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase of the ZVOX 555
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it mainly for the dialog enhancement (DE) and I'm very happy to say it is a great improvement over the sound of the TV. Watching a football or baseball game it is great to hear the comments of the announcer clearly without having to turn the volume up. I play movies and music connected to the ZVOX 555 and for me there is enough bass. I really enjoy this purchase and for other people who have a little problem with hearing I would highly encourage them to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Altheim

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We are older and hearing isn't what it used to be. It really sharpens up dialog at normal levels so we can understand instead of keep turning up volume or turning on captions to read.
customer_reviews.author: stanj

customer_reviews.title: It sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Its a great improvement over my samsung plasma speakers. very easy set up however it needs an optical cord to connect to the samsung smart TV had to run out and pay $22.00 to connect to TV. I did call Zvox and they offered to send one out for free. but I just couldn't wait another 5 days. If you do not want speakers all over the room this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for dialogue
customer_reviews.text: Once it was connected we love this. This came with all the cables except the one we needed. This is its only negative. We ordered the Zvox because we read that it could enhance the dialogue. We needed the volume on the TV so high. This really did the trick! Watching football is a delight as much of the crowd noise is lowered. You can also adjust this so you have a fuller sound also. We love this. It suits our needs to a T.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Schoen

customer_reviews.title: Great sound we have bought two of these sound systems ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound we have bought two of these sound systems and we love the sound. Great Product and we could not be happier. It has real great sound and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a sound bar has been working great and if I need another which I do not ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a sound bar has been working great and if I need another which I do not I would get it.
customer_reviews.author: claudio ieronimo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Soundbar, easy to connect, very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: In the market for better sound from LG TV in relatively small den area. Researched the market for sound quality & value. The ZVOX 555 arrived as stated. Very easy set up. I'm glad I add the Digital Optical cable suggested by Amazon. The "commercial taming technology feature" is super. The vocal quality sound is unmatched. Could not be more pleased with purchase process, service from Amazon, and this ZVOX product. Would recommend without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gaddy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The device is awesome. Great sounding unit. Very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ran-C

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Have a smaller area where my wall mount tv is located. This sound system fits on the shelf under the tv. Great sound. It is a little heavy and bulky, but worth it to have that sort of sound from one box...not having to have speakers sitting all around, or hanging on the walls. Great technology. Hats off to the company..
customer_reviews.author: K. C. Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Simple but great sound
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to install and sounds great. With optical connection I can now listen to great sound on cable,DVD & ROKU, sits under my 51" plasma TV
customer_reviews.author: crpn54tr

product_meta.title: ZVOX 555 Low-Profile Single-Cabinet Surround Sound System with Optical and Coaxial Digital Inputs
product_meta.description:
Only 3.5 high, the ZVOX Z-Base 555 home theater system can be placed beneath your flat-panel TV - so you can have surround sound without adding a lot of clutter to your room. It requires no external speakers, subwoofer or speaker wires. The 555 reproduces TV shows, music and movie soundtracks with lifelike accuracy - including crystal-clear vocals and thunderous bass. And the ZVOX Phase Cue virtual surround system delivers remarkable three-dimensional sound. The entire system-speakers, amplifier, virtual surround technology and powered subwoofer-fits into the super-slim cabinet. With only one connecting cord and a one-page owner's manual, it is truly "plug and play." The cabinet is robustly constructed using fully-braced MDF (medium density fiberboard) - not molded plastic. Beautiful hand-lacquered high-gloss ebony end panels create a stylish look.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


ZVOX SOUNDBASE 555 SINGLE CABINET SURROUND SOUND SYSTEM
Only 3.5" high, the ZVOX SoundBase 555 home theater system can be placed beneath your flat-panel TV so you can have surround sound without adding a lot of clutter to your room. It requires no external speakers, subwoofer or speaker wires. The 555 reproduces TV shows, music and movie soundtracks with lifelike accuracy, including crystal-clear vocals and thunderous bass. And the ZVOX PhaseCue virtual surround system delivers remarkable three-dimensional sound. The entire sound bar system, including speakers, amplifier, virtual surround technology and powered subwoofer, fits into the super-slim cabinet. With only one connecting cord and a one-page owner's manual, it is truly "plug and play." The cabinet is robustly constructed using fully-braced MDF (medium density fiberboard), not molded plastic. Beautiful hand-lacquered high-gloss ebony end panels create a stylish look.

Place the 3.5" high ZVOX 555 beneath your flat-panel TV for surround sound without the clutter. View larger
Even playing at loud volumes, the 555 usually uses less than 10 watts of total power. View larger
Featuring a behind the grill, disappearing 4-digit display for settings and features GREAT SOUND
The most important feature for any home theater system is high quality sound. The 555 uses five high-performance speakers, a built-in powered subwoofer, a real wood (MDF) cabinet and a 70-watt Class D digital amplifier to create warm, natural sound and surprisingly powerful bass.

PHASECUE VIRTUAL SURROUND SOUND
With ZVOX you don't need a room full of speakers for home theater sound. The 555 uses the proprietary PhaseCue virtual surround system to give you rich, three-dimensional sound with movies or music. With music, PhaseCue creates a very wide soundstage--it literally sounds like you are listening to speakers eight feet apart from each other. When listening to a good movie, the soundtrack will envelop you, putting you in the middle of the action.

The benefits of PhaseCue vary greatly based on program material. Live music and well-recorded modern movie soundtracks will deliver rich, three-dimensional sound, pulling the sound out from the speakers and into the room to literally surround the listener. While no virtual surround system will give you the exact surround effects of a good 5.1 system, the ZVOX 555 does a remarkable job.

PhaseCue virtual surround system gives you rich, three-dimensional sound with movies or music. View larger
Front controls include power, volume, mute and input selection, plus a 3.5mm stereo input for easy attachment of your smartphone or MP3 player. View larger
Featuring inputs for analog stereo, optical, and coaxial digital. View larger GREEN DESIGN
The 555 uses a highly-efficient Class D digital amplifier. Even playing at quite loud volumes, it usually uses less than 10 watts of total power. And standby power usage tends to hover around 0.1 watts, making it one of the "greenest" audio systems ever made. The 555 is Energy Star qualified.

SETTING A NEW STANDARD FOR VOCAL CLARITY
ZVOX systems are known for their remarkable vocal clarity. The 555 adds a stunning new feature: Dialog Emphasis (DE). When you push the "DE" button on the remote control you engage a circuit that mimics the functions of a hearing aid. The frequencies used by human voices are emphasized and compressed, while other frequencies are minimized. No other speaker system provides such an easy-to-use and effective method for improving the intelligibility of television dialog.

USES YOUR REMOTE CONTROL
The new Z-Base systems can be programmed to respond to your remote control. The illuminated display walks you through a less-than-a-minute programming cycle. Then your TV remote...or cable box remote...or satellite receiver remote...or ANY remote...can control volume, mute, power and input functions of the ZVOX system.

TAMING COMMERCIALS THAT ARE TOO LOUD
If you've ever been blasted out of your chair by a too-loud commercial, or by a cable channel that's twice as loud as another channel, you'll love the new Output Leveling (OL) feature on the ZVOX 555. Just push the "OL" button and a sophisticated compression system takes over, making soft sounds louder and loud sounds softer, so there are fewer jarring moments when switching channels or when commercials come on.

DISAPPEARING DISPLAY
The 555 features a four-digit display located behind the speaker grille that shows the current setting for volume, bass, treble and PhaseCue (virtual surround)--and also shows when you have engaged the Mute, Output Leveling (OL) or Dialog Emphasis (DE) features. A few seconds after you stop using your remote (or front panel) controls, the display disappears completely.

CONNECT YOUR IPOD AND OTHER DEVICES
The 555 has two analog audio inputs, one optical digital input, and one coaxial digital input, plus a front-panel 3.5mm analog stereo input for convenient connection of your iPod or other portable audio device. Any specific input can be selected using either the remote control or the slim-line module below the speaker grille.

WOOD (MDF) CABINET WITH HAND-LACQUERED SIDE PANELS
The 555 features a hand-built cabinet of MDF (Medium Density Fiberboard) with beautiful hand-lacquered high-gloss end panels. Its low-profile design blends perfectly with flat-panel TVs. Most people don't even notice the ZVOX 555 until they hear it.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
ZVOX Z-base 555, 1 stereo RCA to stereo RCA connecting cable, multifunction remote control with programming instruction sheet, power cord, one-sheet safety instructions, operations manual, Quick Start guide.

ZVOX SOUNDBASE SYSTEM COMPARISON CHART
ZVOX 220ZVOX 320ZVOX 420ZVOX 555ZVOX 580 Dolby Digital Support1 Advanced Processor for enhanced virtual surround and musical fidelity Output Leveling to tame loud commercials Dialog Emphasis for super-clear vocals Built-in Powered Subwoofer Wood (MDF) Cabinet Switching between multiple A/V devices Can learn to respond to other remotes Front connection for iPod or other devices Volume and power controls on sound system Bass Adjustment Control Treble Adjustment Control PhaseCue II Virtual Surround Sound Multiple Virtual Surround Settings Main Speakers(3) 2"(3) 2"(5) 2"(5) 2"(5) 3.25" Subwoofer(1) 5.25"(1) 5.25"(1) 5.25"(1) 5.25"(2) 6.5" Dimensions (Height x Width x Depth)3.4" x 17" x 12.5"3.5" x 24" x 11.5"3.5" x 28" x 14.5"3.5" x 28" x 14.55" x 36" x 16.5" Recommended for use under TVs2 sized...37" or smaller27" - 42"32" - 50"37" - 55"42" - 70" TV Base Maximum Depth11"10"14"14"16" TV Base Maximum Width16"22"26"26"34" TV Weight Limit (lbs)405070125165 AC Power Requirement100-240V, 50/60 Hz100-240V, 50/60 Hz100-240V, 50/60 Hz120 Volts only120 Volts only  1. If a TV is connected to an off-air HDTV antenna or to an HD cable TV feed without a cable box, a sound system connected to the TV's digital audio output may require a Dolby Labs license. The analog audio output of a TV will always work, if present.
 2. These are guidelines. Confirm your TV base fits within the width and depth of the top of the ZVOX Audio system. It is not necessary to place a TV on top of a ZVOX Audio system. A ZVOX Audio system sounds excellent placed near a TV. Allow for a 1.75" space behind the ZVOX system for rear panel connections.
feature_bullets: Weight: 20 pounds. With box and packing: 23 pounds.
Amplifier: The 555 uses a high-efficiency 70 watt Class D digital amplifier.
Rear inputs: (2) analog stereo inputs, (1) optical (To slink) digital input, (1) coaxial digital input.
Front input: (1) 3.5mm stereo front panel input.
